website_summaries.verdict: An acceptable pick for cleaning floor grout that isn't overly dirty. If you need a grout steamer for quick cleanups or to maintain a fresh look, this tool will suffice.
pros: An easy-to-use steam mop with an angled head that makes cleaning grout on floors a snap
cons: Requires patience, as it doesn't heat up very fast
Tough dirt will challenge it, and frequent pad replacements are required

customer_reviews.title: Be careful ordering replacement pads.....
customer_reviews.text: The mop is very good. HOWEVER, do not buy the "bargain" or "H20' replacement pads. They do not fit this product....much too small. Buy O-Cedar replacement pads only as they are the ones that fit this product. I've reported to Amazon that the replacement pad images shown with products "bought together" contains products that do not fit. I do not know why this has not been corrected and I hope this review helps others to not make the same error in purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Eidell

customer_reviews.title: Full Steam Ahead!
customer_reviews.text: The steam mop is great and works the way it is suppose to. It cleans the floor completely and drys it also. However, the one problem I had was with the water tank. I could not see when it was filled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ragusa

customer_reviews.title: Hot Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 6 months of light use, and then became irrevocably clogged, despite several rounds of demineralizing. Now will not heat up enough to actually produce steam. O-Cedar makes it so annoying to return under warranty - you need to ship the whole appliance back (on your own dime of course) so that they can inspect each unit and then determine if you voided the warranty - that I'm sure they are banking on people just throwing it away. Or pouring CLR in it to unclog it, which is what youtube DIY vids say to do. Which will, naturally, void the warranty. So lame.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Foodtruck

customer_reviews.title: I loved it and it worked wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for approximately 6 months. Using it about 2-3 times a month. I loved it and it worked wonderfully. It was just my lab and myself. I turned it on one day and realized that the heating coils had totally burned out and no steam any long. For the price I paid I would have expected a much longer life longevity! Very disappointed and will not buy that brand again! Buyer beware of shotty workmanship! Just sayin
customer_reviews.author: Brenda williamson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and impossible to fix
customer_reviews.text: This mop broke down on me after a few times of uses. It'd making a bumping noice but there was no more steam. I bought it a while back and couldn't return it. So I tried repairing it but this mop uses screws with triangle head, and the screws are hidden in a deep tube. There's effectively no way to fix these mops on your own! To me, that means the manufacture knows well that this mop can easily break, and they blocked the path for customers to fix them. I would recommend not buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: My bissell steamer broke so I ordered this based on price n review. Used it as soon as it was delivered. Like it much better than my bissell. Lighter, less parts ( no filter requires), less time to heat up n easier to operate. Its triangular shape allows it to reach corners better than the bissell. Cost half the price of a bissell. Win win. Only reason I didn't give it a five star is because the water reservoir is not clear n removable, can't see the water level or discard unused water. I just keep the mop on till all water got steamed away.
customer_reviews.author: d.lee

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Received the mop two days ago and went straight to work on the bathroom shower. It isn’t a miracle machine— you can see in the picture that my grout still needs work— but it got a LOT up from the tiles that I couldn’t get from scrubbing for hours with chemicals. I’m very happy with the mop so far and will update this review if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It is easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It is easy to assemble and use. I originally purchased a Hoover; but it died after one use. The Hoover gave more steam and cleaned great; but this unit is more durable. However; the unit that I received is not an "O-Cedar". The unit that I received is labeled a Vileda, made in China, and distributed out of Montreal, Quebec. A cotton wash-cloth works well (on flat floors and floors with narrow grout lines) as a cleaning pad rather than buying costly replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: Just another Tom

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I didn't get to use this right away due to surgery. 1st time use today. Put water in, plugged in, waited and waited and waited and nothing. Wasted $70, too late to send back. Went by positive reviews - junk.
customer_reviews.author: terbooks

customer_reviews.title: O Cedar steam mop
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t able to use it right away, but when I finally got it out to mop it wouldn’t work. Sounded like it was trying to work, but no steam at all. It was retuned.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a Swiffer for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but I didn't like how long it took to dry and it's really not easy to fill. I'd much rather have a removable tank because keeping track of the measuring cup is not ideal when you have a toddler in the house. The picture is what it looked like after I had just used my Swiffer on my floors. I couldn't believe the difference this steam mop makes until I saw it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Oopsiemommy

customer_reviews.title: Really lifts the dirt!
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I just used this for the first time today, but I love it! I have tile floors in my kitchen & bathrooms, & I’ve tried multiple mops. Nothing has worked until this! I spot tested multiple spots after mopping & it was clean as can be! Other mops always left residue/dirt behind. I think because my tile is textured regular mops couldn’t get to all of the dirt. With this mop, however, the steam lifts all of the dirt out. I’m very pleased! It was really easy to put together & only takes 20 seconds to start steaming. I am in love with this product! Pictures are from after one use! 😳
customer_reviews.author: Virgo43

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working then rusted our
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and cleans my floors for a month ther stopped steaming and just dripped the water out the bottom, only ever used distilled water in reservoir. Later noticed some of the internal parted where getting rusted. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: aaron jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Powerful steam and very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd steam mop I have bought. My previous one was a different popular brand, and it quit working a couple of months ago after 6 years of use. This O'Cedar mop is much better and was less expensive. I love the on/off switch and the adjustable steam. It really cranks out the steam. The triangle shaped head is better for corners and going around furniture than my previous rectangular shaped mop. It also holds more water - I filled only twice to mop over 1,000 square feet of sealed hardwood, vinyl & tile. The mop pads are thick and glide easily on all my surfaces. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No steam
customer_reviews.text: I am experiencing the same issue reported by several other buyers. Out of the box, this mop does not work. Despite waiting significantly longer than the advertised 20s heat up time, I never get any steam. The mop makes a continuous clicking sound, and I can feel the front get slightly warmer, but the water inside the reservoir never changes temperature. Do not waste your time with this product. I am returning immediately and not bothering with a replacement after taking a closer look at all of the more recent 1 and 2 star reviews
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great steam mop!
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of reviews and focusing on what I was going to use the O’Cedar steam mop for. The O’Cedar won. My husband and I love this steam mop. The shape of the head allows for cleaning in small spaces. It is so easy to use. Reusable pads wash up easily. Be sure and order extra as you are likely to go into a cleaning spree after seeing the results.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Sandee

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this steam cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible steam cleaner! Very easy to assemble and use. It is light weight and easily gets into corners with the triangle shape head. It takes 20 seconds for the water to heat to the correct temperature. It is easy to fill and easy to empty when you are finished. It cleans beautifully! I have wood look vinyl flooring in my living room. It has a fairly deep grain. It cleaned it with just one movement of the cleaner. I had no idea my floors were so dirty! I highly recommend this steam cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A.

customer_reviews.title: serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: i got this since I have young kids/toddlers. This is super helpful for a quick job. heats up in 20 sec. I have had it for a few months, no issues. it does not get off food that is normally hard to get off with a mop anyway. it does all the dirt and easier stuff. i go over hard stuff a few times and it helps. So not amazing, but does mostly what I wanted it to (I just need to get it out sooner sometimes, ha ha). but easy to use, well worth price. I am also pregnant, and this is not hard at all to push around, much easier than a regular mop
customer_reviews.author: mkiiii

customer_reviews.title: Great no-nonsense floor steamer. We wanted simple and found it.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a steam mop with no bells and whistles to break, just something to steam our floors. After using it, the pad was a lot dirtier than we thought it would be, but made us happy knowing that it did such a great job cleaning and hopefully disinfecting as well. The lowest setting was sufficient to clean our floors, including our wall to wall carpeted bedroom - the rug attachment was easy to use. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money I ordered this and was excited to use it the model was easy to assemble but I got absolutely no steam. The instructions have no trouble shooting suggestions so I returned it and ordered a replacement. The second one makes a clicking noise as if it was pumping the steam out but alas still no steam. I will not be replacing it with any other o cedar product but instead another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is useless.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even clean as well as a regular mop. Assembly was very difficult - the basin wouldn't snap into the bottom of the mop. The quality is very poor. For 80 dollars, this is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight and stick on feature for the cloths ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop may "sanitize" but it doesn't clean as well as my last one of another brand. I finally cut up a microfiber cloth and mopped very, very slowly at maximum speed and finally mopped up most of the dirt instead of just pushing it around with the cloths that come with it. I like the weight and stick on feature for the cloths much better than my last model, but I can't see the water level, the cord is very short, and as I said, it doesn't clean much at all.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Completely stopped steaming after 1 year and 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: What a shame. I have to revise my original review. Mop worked for exactly one and 3 months and then completely stopped steaming. I can't get it to start again, even following all the directions that came with the product. Now I guess I have to buy another one--I'm hoping o-cedar will stand by their product, and would happily revise my review if they did.
customer_reviews.author: Lily C.

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this product. The mop was easily assembled but once plugged in it never produced any steam. Waited for 20 minutes for steam but nothing. Returned the product for a refund. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is probably a nice steam cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a steam cleaner. It's easy to use, lightweight and the pads are washable and re-useable. I said it is "probably " a good steam cleaner because I've concluded my expectations were probably too high. I bought this to remove dried on carpet glue from hardwood floors that had been carpeted for over 30yrs. Some of what I thought should be removed were actually glue stains into the hardwood. The glue had been on the surface for so long, till it actually stained the wood just like you were trying to apply a stain. The adjustable steam control will actually remove wax on a high setting, so it probably will do deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: jeagle47

customer_reviews.title: Thorough cleaning for wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my 90 year oak hardwood floors well without chemicals. Its good to know my floors are cleaned thoroughly. Doesn't get wet enough to warp the wood. I follow with floor wax to preserve the wood and enhance the finish. Easy to use. I keep extra pads and wash in washing machine. The pads hold up to the washer well.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Black.

customer_reviews.title: Short cord, but great cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mop! I've owned a Shark steam mop before, and this is pretty comparable. It makes some odd popping noises, but that seems to be normal. The only drawback I've found is that the cord is a bit short; since my entire house is tile, that means I've had to sort of strategically plan my cleaning journey. But I'm very happy with how clean it gets my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an old-model Shark (the new Sharks are not the same and twice the price) and was skeptical about this item. But I have been using it over a year and am so glad I bought it. It works well, the two pads have lasted well and have been through rough abuse. I drop and abuse the unit but it is still going strong. The one drawback is that the cord is about 6 feet too short for my needs - the Shark cord was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: A few dozen
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. The steam, the maneuverability, the weight, and the knobby pads that scrub so well. The texture of the pads pick up the dirt instead of just smearing it around. They wash well, besides. I'm using filtered water in the steamer (from my Brita pitcher) although the directions say tap water is ok. If the steam mop clogs with minerals, I'll update this review. The reservoir for the water is small, but that helps keep the steam mop light weight. Refilling isn't hard, and we've done so several dozen times so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.Jones

customer_reviews.title: The swivel base easily cleaned corners and along baseboards
customer_reviews.text: I used the steam mop for the first time four days after cleaning my vinyl floors with soap and water applied with a sponge mop. This steam mop picked up dirt and soap residue left behind by the sponge mop and left my floors shining! The swivel base easily cleaned corners and along baseboards. When tested on an unused area of my carpeting cleaned a month prior, it also picked up dirt and soap residue. Light weight, easy to use, effective cleaner without soap, ready for use in seconds . . . great product!
customer_reviews.author: wishopper2012

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love, love the continuous steam! Cleans the floor quickly and dries fast. Works better when you don't add anything but water. I spray any dirty areas with Bona floor cleaner, but clear water works fine. I wish the mop triangle was a little bit smaller so that I can easily glide between the toilet and tub. Plan to get additional mop heads - you can wash them but after a while they just look bad.
customer_reviews.author: JBrown

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it worked beautifully until the handle broke off the ball joint. It doesn't seem to be able to be repaired. I would like a replacement, but not sure how to contact the seller. This would have gotten an overall 5 star review if it had not broken so soon. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Raindrop

customer_reviews.title: Used a shark for years and was happy but the O-Cedar has some great aspects
customer_reviews.text: Used a shark for years and was happy but the O-Cedar has some great aspects. It will get in all my corners very easy and because it isn't as bulky it fits under everything here. Also it is much lighter.
customer_reviews.author: KRWS

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steam mop in Aug of 2017 but didn't open the box and use the mop until December. I've used the steam mop 5 times in a 15 x 15 room and it no longer works. It worked great while it worked but I would think that for nearly $70 it should work more than 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaBabe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new steam mop!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new O'Cedar steam mop. I had a popular brand of steam mop years ago and was pleased with it, but never replaced it when it stopped working. I decided it was time to go with steam again and saw the O'Cedar model. Very glad that I chose it over the brand I had previously. Love the triangular shaped head. It pivots well and gets into tight spaces. Also really impressed with the adjustability of the same level. The O-Cedar also seems to be made much better then what I had before. Feels much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: O-Cedar Steam Mop, where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: O-Cedar Steam Mop, where have you been all my life! It just arrived today and was tried for the first time. Easy to assemble and works great. I chose this brand, model, shape and price range because my mop-able floor space is on the smaller side. I was concerned about where to store it but, with the mop's head removed, it fits easily in a 6" (a bit less) space between the fridge and the wall - no problem. Love this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie-Opie

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, easy to use and does a great job without making a mess. i have had a bissell which is highly rated previously but would always leak water even when thoroughly heated up. this is 30 dollars less and works like a charm. i found it much easier to use. i am thinking this might be the shape of the mop head. great job so far cleaning my floors(esp after my rescue dogs make a mess::(( ) update: quit working with little use. so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kandylandmo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: This steam mop is made twice as good as the Bissell I bought. Just water is needed. Goes into corners beautifully. Steamed spots right off. Very solidly built. The Bissell product I originally bought, came apart constantly, I had to refill it every 5 minutes. This steam mop I had to refill once after a 20 minute stretch of cleaning. Then I popped the pad off and threw it into laundry washer. Yes I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gluten free Bakery

customer_reviews.title: Fast heating
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice steam mop. I have had bad luck with other models breaking in the past. This one is still going strong after a couple of years. It heats up very quickly -- well under a minute, and it is ready to use. The triangular pad is washing machine safe, but I let it air dry. The mop is light, but still does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great steam mop!
customer_reviews.text: I am REALLY glad I found this on a lightning deal. I hadn't used a steam mop in years and totally missed it, so I was looking for a new one. It's hard for me to justify the price because they don't seem to last. I am really happy with this so far. Super easy to use, does a really good job! I like that you can really get into the corners with the angled head. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie A.

customer_reviews.title: Coddle Your Inner Germaphobe
customer_reviews.text: If you are finicky about cleanliness, you must get a steam mop, and this one works exceedingly well. It's easy to use, easy to fill, and a tank of water does my two small tile floors a couple of times before I need to top off. The carpet cleaning attachment is great for spot cleaning and I love that it includes 2 cleaning pads. Where would a germaphobe be without this mop??
customer_reviews.author: L. Parent

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste money.  same as using a wet rag dipped in hot water.  There is no steam, just warm water.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about this product. If i was using a wet rag dipped in hot water I would get my cleaning job done way faster. There is no steam, its just gets water warm.
customer_reviews.author: sport555win

customer_reviews.title: Died with less than 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I used this maybe 2-3 times a month and after a few months, it no longer steams, just spreads water everywhere. It's basically useless now, considering that the clean factor came from the steam. The mop pad isn't enough to pull grime and dirt from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice control and steam is great
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. My 11-year-old son did it for me. The handle is a nice length for my tall family. I like how quickly the "head" maneuvers around. Only thing, it took longer than 20 seconds for the steam to start. Thought something was wrong since it it took longer than the 20-seconds it stated it would. Nothing wrong--water was just too cold. It took about 1:30 min to get going. I like how the steam just went, and I didn't have to pump the handle like another model I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This investment is the best one I've made for my self and my home. I have a bad hip and can no longer use a standard mop to clean my floors. This O-Cedar steam mop does such a beautiful job in such a short time with so little effort on my part ... I only wish I'd bought it sooner. Do Not Pass This One Up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this appliance
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this floor steamer. I owned a different brand of this appliance that I enjoyed using, but ended up giving it to my sister for her floors. I now have tile floors in my house and purchased this cleaner. I like this one even better than my first one. It was a good price and works great. Makes cleaning almost enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: NM Artist

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.text: If you are contemplating about buying one of these, do it! For the price, it cleans and disinfects well! I'm so glad I don't have to go back to the standard mop and bucket anymore. If my floors need extra cleaning, I usually will go over with the steam mop twice and that will do the trick (usually not often). I like to add a few drops of my essential oils in the water so that the house smells nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: lsaechao

customer_reviews.title: Could not get this to work the first time
customer_reviews.text: This was easy enough to assemble out of the box, but the steam never got through to the head. Once it is snapped together it will not come apart so it is not possible to return it in original packaging as required. My return time lapses while I waited to hear back from o-cedar via their website. Now I am out $70 with nothing to show for it. Thanks a lot. Happy to adjust this review if someone will contact me about how to fix the mop. If I wanted a dry mop I would have purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since February 2016 and I really like it. I previously had a Bissell that was really heavy and lasted about a year. This one is light weight so I have to apply some pressure if there is something stuck on the floor but I don't mind it. I really like that it has an on/off switch because holding the trigger on the Bissell was a pain. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: scotedo

customer_reviews.title: The pad on the bottom folds over when you are using it which is super annoying. The cord is so short it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. The pad on the bottom folds over when you are using it which is super annoying. The cord is so short it comes out of the plug when I am using it. The cord holding part doesn’t revolve for quick release. It does have good heat, gets in corners well, and is light weight. I really miss my old steam mop in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: I love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer! it was easy to assemble. It gives out a lot of steam and you don't have to wait for it! It's light weight but well made. I mainly wanted it for the carpet glide so I can freshen up my carpets. The shark used to have one but doesn't anymore. But I love it for my hard floors as well. Good product, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I truly dislike this product. I’m furious that I paid nearly $100.00 for this item (tax included) and it does an average job, at best. I would not recommend this steam mop to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: *Sparkle*

customer_reviews.title: Light and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit after much research and pleased so far. It is easy to handle, comes with two replacement pads that are easy to add/remove. The level of steam (adjustable) was effective for my tiled kitchen (have yet to try it on carpet). The water reservoir (distilled water only!!) is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Kayvee

customer_reviews.title: Clogs after limited use
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, easy to use, gets in corners. However, it only operates for several months and the clogs up. We have paid for two units, and received one under warranty. Each time we thought the problem was a fluke. (we regularly have treated them with white vinegar to minimize clogs and have always used distilled water) Three in the trash is enough. Trying another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Florida reader

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Steam Mop
customer_reviews.text: Best $ I have spent in years. Extremely pleased with this mop. It is light, cord long enough, swivels easily, triangular design is great for corners, easy to fill and empty, pads stay on well with the velcro placements, easy to assemble, has an off and on switch, has steam in seconds, and you have complete control over the amount of steam. It has been a long time since I have seen how beautiful my tiled floors are due to build up of floor products. And the price is great. Have not tried to refresh my carpets yet. I would highly recommend this mop and will be purchasing more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum and then using this makes my job easy and great cleaning process
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must with lots of flooring in your home. Vacuum and then using this makes my job easy and great cleaning process. Also if you really want to make sure you have gotten rid of all germs. Have a spray bottle of white vinegar and spray then do steam mop over.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the steam mop in March of 2016. I love it, and will always have one in my home. Most of the time, after a quick sweep or vacuum (or better yet--after I set my vacuum robot loose) I use the steam mop by itself. It does a good job and the hot steam dries quickly. Sometimes I spray a tile cleaner on the floor first and follow up with the steamer. The mop handles easily and the head moves from side to side to easily get into corners and smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault that I didn't get to use this in time to send it back. It was bought as a gift but the person I gave it to had received a different one already. That part was the lucky part. I decided I would keep it and use it for our workshop bathroom. New out of the box, easy to put together, filled tank, turned it on and clicking started. Canister warmed a little but after 20 seconds, no steam. After 5 min, no steam, after 10 min, no steam. Now it's going to cost me added money to take to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: The best steam mop I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only steam mop I've had that's lasted more than a few months. I've used the Shark and other products; this one works well. The head shape is useful for getting through corners and odd shaped spaces. However it's not very wide so it takes more passes than some of the other products in this category. So far I've had good results on my bamboo flooring and have had no dulling.
customer_reviews.author: BCSquare

customer_reviews.title: I love this steam mop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first steam mop and I love it !!! It makes mopping so much easier, no having to lug around water , no more buckets and the steam, it sanitizer the floor! U can choose to use floor cleaner be it's not needed . I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love it except a one issue.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a fantastic option. I have used the shark steamer and the two are very comparable. One issue that the shark handles better than this one is that this model doesn't steam all the way to the edge of the pad like the shark. This makes cleaning corners impossible. It's not too bad to handle these areas by hand, but it is the one drawback. Otherwise, it has a strong stream flow and a nice sized water tank (it goes further than you'd think). The cord is long enough to handle all of my rooms. Good buy for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much. I live on a horse farm and own a dog and two cats as well as dogsit friends dogs often. Between the dirt and hair that's dragged in and the occasional accident on the floor this product does an amazing job of cleaning what my swiffer cannot. I have all hard wood floors so i use it in every room. It heats up super quick and even though it's water based i just add a couple drops of essential oils to get a great smell as i clean. Amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Marissa W

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean up but leaves marks
customer_reviews.text: This mop is great to clean up quick spills and messes. I wouldn’t recommend for heavy duty floor cleaning . Also would not recommend leaving on a wood floor while steam is heating, it leaves marks on wood floors that are permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Ji

customer_reviews.title: Only good for the first few months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first few months. It was lightly used, about 1-2 times a month, on tile floor. After a while, it stopped steaming, so I cleaned it out with a mixture of half water and half vinegar. That did the trick and unclogged it for about 2 more uses. Now it's completely dead and will not steam anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful Steam Mop!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this steam mop! I immediately took it out and used it! It cleaned my floating hardwood floor very well and they look great! Then I took it to my living room carpet with the attachment for carpet on it and it worked wonderfully!!!! I am so pleased! It heated up very fast and had no issues! This is definitely going to be my go to for anything mess related in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: It worked good on ceramic tile
customer_reviews.text: It worked good on ceramic tile. I was able to mop the floors in a lot less time than it took to do it the usual way. Also much easier. As for using in on carpets don't expect it to do much cleaning. It will mainly freshen them up, but it does seem to kill dust mites. So it can be useful there too.
customer_reviews.author: David K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions, I suppose
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is great. I guess everyone has their own preferences for housecleaning. It takes a very short time for the water to start steaming. The floor dries immediately. Then I just throw the cleaning pad into my laundry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it should simply snap back in place
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the handle was cracked when I got the machine. It looks like it should simply snap back in place, but it wouldn't. The machine works great. It leaves very little water behind and does a great job cleaning ceramic tile and wood flooring. The handle is much more stable and strong than most machines on the market. It generates steam continuously and really gets into the corners. Its also very each to maneuver around objects as well. I liked it so much that I decided to keep it and simply put black electrical tape on the handle to fix the crack. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's so easy to use and gets into those corners with ease. And I love that it uses plain water, no chemicals. Gets the floors spotless. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: lilygls

customer_reviews.title: Love a steam mop; HATE the brand
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this brand. I used it 3 times but the 4th time it stopped putting out steam. I tossed it. Today, I'm going to Walmart and buy what I should have bought to begin with - Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: J. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This makes it easy to mop. with no bucket pf water needed. I got rid of my old sponge mop, which was hard to clean and annoying to have to dip in water. The steam amount is adjustable and there is an extra cloth so you can wash 1 when it gets dirty. There is a long cord, although I wish it was longer (my electric sockets are not well placed).
customer_reviews.author: Arden Himmelbrand

customer_reviews.title: new mop would not produce steam
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mop but did not put it together to use until 2 months after purchase. Mop would not heat enough to produce steam. To late to return it so I am out the purchase price. I should have read all the negative reviews before I purchased the mop because there were quite a few with the same problem. Will never purchase an o cedar product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for getting rid of cat sick!
customer_reviews.text: Great for wooden floors, especially when you have pets. I've gone from vacuuming the floors once a week and moping once a year to pushing this around after every vacuum. The pads wash easilly in the machine (buy more pads so you can swap out after every use. Easy to use and small to store.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kingtiger

customer_reviews.title: This steam mop does a great job! Needs longer power cord.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mop! It works great to steam clean my hardwood and bathroom tile floors. It heats up very fast. The shape of the microfiber head is perfect for getting into corners and tight places. The only complaint that I have is the cord isn’t very long, so I had to plug and unplug it multiple times in the same room and it won’t stretch far enough to clean my stair treads (I have 4 flights of stairs) Will have to purchase an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: J. Seagraves

customer_reviews.title: Steam Mop on The Go
customer_reviews.text: This Steam Mop is amazing! it really does get my floors clean without having to get down on my hands and knees. I have a huge area to clean which includes my kitchen, dining area, as well as the hallway leading to the two bathrooms. This mop just whisks along and I get my floors done in no time. It's also good to use for quick mop ups in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Delphine (Dee) A. Richert

customer_reviews.title: Buying again for my mom
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer mop! It heats up SUPER fast. Has different heat settings for whatever you want to clean. Whether its a quick pass over or a deep spot clean on carpets for pet stains. This thing works and I love it! Toss the pads in the washing machine and they come clean to reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great on stone tile. Totally worth the money to clean without the use of harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved into a place with stone tile that the previous owners left pretty dirty. We had mopped and scrubbed to no avail. So We we started looking for a solution to clean the floors without the use of harsh chemicals that would really get in there. We purchased this mop and after 1 pass in the kitchen (10x 5) we were BLOWN away by how clean it got them. If you are on the fence about this product I say go for it. It works amazing and is extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne Westerveld

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am buying a second one of these for my summer home. This is hands down the best little floor steamer I’ve ever owned! By far superior to Shark steam mop.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Crummy Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: The mop failed afer about 5 months. Did not produce steam. O'Cedar agreed to replace the mop. That was several weeks ago. I promises could clean a floor, you could eat off mine. Will not consider this company or their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non operational out of box
customer_reviews.text: Setup new product per instructions. Item did not produce steam on first use. Boxed up and returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grandelli

customer_reviews.title: Heats Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Mop is great! heats up super fast! it's superb for quick mop-ups. works great on my new vinyl and hardword floors! I love how easily the pads stick on the bottom with the strong velcro and the fact that they are washable and reusable. Very Pleased with this lightweight and easy to use and store electric mop.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Only thing is that you can't see the amount of water inside but other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Test it out and I have no complaints. Compact, convenient and gets the job done!! Only thing is that you can't see the amount of water inside but other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Handles and cleans well, but it's a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The mop seems to work OK. It generates steam quickly. It handles pretty well without straining. It seems to clean pretty well. The only thing I don't like about the mop is that it's a bit flimsy. If you press on it, the mop flexes. I don't know if this will lead to something on the mop breaking later on. But I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 stars because of the flimsiness.
customer_reviews.author: FlatPicker

customer_reviews.title: That was a great decision! Love this mop for my tiles and ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the H20 x12 mop for $90, used once and wasn't thrilled, so i returned it and bought this one. That was a great decision! Love this mop for my tiles and love that it has a carpet option - been using it on my rugs and they look fresh and new. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Me

customer_reviews.title: Really love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this O Cedar steam mop for well over a year, use it 4-5 times a month in a small apartment of mostly wood-look flooring. It has been reliable and no problems with using Austin, TX tap water. Love the swivel head. I wish the mop head was a bit bigger but overall, I am very pleased with this and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynpaseo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this steam mop!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mop! Really works fabulously and effortlessly. Assembled in a "snap". Fully ready to use steam in 20-30 seconds. Swivels nicely, getting into hard-to-reach areas. The dirt it cleaned up was surprising. Floor dried quickly afterward. Ready to walk on in 3 minutes, max. No harsh chemicals or detergents needed. I really LOVE this mop and highly recommend it. Better than my last steam mop for which I paid over $100.
customer_reviews.author: jonnialogy

customer_reviews.title: Great steam mop!
customer_reviews.text: Love this steam mop so far. Easy to assemble and maneuver. It didn’t feel cheap or flimsy like that last one i purchased. Currently using it on my laminate flooring and carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Bwii

customer_reviews.title: love clean floors
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! My dog has bladder issues and is an escape artist from her crate. she has accidents sometimes. I have used this for the past 4 months. Haven't seen any damage done to floor. and I know my floors are clean. no harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: A part missing
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. I wanted one that would be good in corners. This does the job. The only thing that was wrong. is that it said there would be {one extra refill. There was no refill, at all??. I don't even what the refill was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe four times over the course of seven months before it completely died....when I turn it on now, the indicator light comes on, but nothing happens. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Ehrisman

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning power!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of buying cleaning refills for other mops, I decided to give this one a try while it was a lightening deal. I am so glad I did! Cleans wonderfully, and streak free! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MamaHen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a year.
customer_reviews.text: This little mop broke far too quickly--I thought it would last at least a year, but it worked for just nine months before it stopped producing steam. I've tried and tried to make it work, to no avail. Are disposable steam mops the new thing? I should not have purchased extra mopping cloths!
customer_reviews.author: EmDee

customer_reviews.title: Product works well. Only thing I didn't think about ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Only thing I didn't think about was it being corded. So, to do all the floors. I need to unplug and plug it in several times. Not really an issue because it heats up so quickly. I just hope this doesn't effect the life of the steam mop. Will probably get an extension cord so I do not need to do turn it off and on so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Should last longer than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine, I wouldn't say it was good for really deep cleans...more like everyday light/med dirt. I would give it 4 stars if it didn't quit working after 3 months. Just won't steam anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure how well I would like this when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how well I would like this when I bought it, but it is so easy. Add some water turn it on and wait the few seconds for it to get to temperature and mop. And it really does clean well. No chemicals to mix or rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great mop... Much better than the shark
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much and it does leave everything so super clean and dries in seconds however I used it on my hardwood floors and just after a few uses then sheen seems to have dulled quite a bit. So now I use it only once a week or once every two weeks on the hardwood but as for tile this mop is fantastic. Easy set up and easy to use. Steams in less than 30 seconds. This machine has complete replaced my shark vac and steam.
customer_reviews.author: AshokAjay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a year and it’s already broken it is not steaming it’s just shooting water out it’s sad I can’t even get it apart because it’s got triangle screws on it
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Go for better vs price.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for tile floor, cleaned well. Hated it for wood floors, dulled them immediately and left a permanent mark on floor. Died today when I was using it for the second time, no longer produces steam. Junk, go for something better vs low price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough steam
customer_reviews.text: This steam mop does not seem to release quite enough steam to really clean the floor. This is compared to a prior steam mop I owned. Still helpful for light cleaning or I add a little water to the floor first.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mop!  Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this mop! You do not have to pump it for it to steam, there is an on/off switch, you can adjust the amount of steam, the cleaning pad picks up little pieces missed when sweeping, the shape of the mop head makes for easy cleaning in corners and around edges. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Microfiber Steam Mop with 1 Extra Refill
feature_bullets: Heats from plug-in to steam in just 20 seconds.
Kills 99. 9% of bacteria* on floors without any cleaning chemicals. (Tested on E. Coli bacterium)
Includes a Snap-On glider to refresh carpets plus an extra Microfiber pad.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,093 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
